# scooldr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R build status](https://github.com/Cervangirard/scooldr/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Cervangirard/scooldr/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of scooldr is to interact with Scoold App. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("Cervangirard/scooldr")
```
